title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing the 'Finish' button, the JAR packager reports the error message: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: When pressing the 'Finish' button to create a JAR file, the system displays an error message stating that the JAR creation failed due to unsaved editors.
EB: After pressing the 'Finish' button, the JAR packager should successfully create the JAR file without any errors related to unsaved editors.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Start the JAR packager. 
2. Proceed with the JAR creation process. 
3. Ensure that there are unsaved editors open. 
4. Press the 'Finish' button to complete the JAR creation process.
